data.text:
For the Mota-Engil Group, Africa is a second home. This adventures started in 1946 and since day one we are developing a solid experience in investment and knowledge in construction.

We show, over the years, a true commitment in the development of the African region and currently we are present in 15 countries generating, on a daily basis, new opportunities to maximize all capabilities of the African continent.

We have a wide portfolio, with a long term strategic perspective and a broad performance horizon, trying to strengthen partnerships in order to execute projects in the areas of infrastructure, transport and logistic, energy, Oil & Gas and Environment. We are concerned about developing each project tailored to our clientsâ€™ needs, in order to rise the African Continent to the dimension of its economic development potentialities. We try to identify the best challenges and materialize them into positive results, guaranteeing a permanent competitiveness and innovation in the solutions presented to strengthen the international position.
